price: Ou bien est-ce que ceux qui ont une maladie au cœur escomptent qu’Allah ne saura jamais faire apparaître leur haine ?
arabic: أَمۡ حَسِبَ ٱلَّذِينَ فِي قُلُوبِهِم مَّرَضٌ أَن لَّن يُخۡرِجَ ٱللَّهُ أَضۡغَٰنَهُمۡ

version.title: French Translation - Muhammad Hamidullah
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Muhammad Hamidullah. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: am ḥasiba alladhīna fī qulūbihim maraḍun an lan yukh'rija al-lahu aḍghānahum
